By the pure expression, it is inferred that the author considers the celebration for the day of love and friendship in Peru, as an opportunity to
A) Protect the most vulnerable populations.
B) highlight the effective actions of the government.
C) Camouflar the existing gender violence in the country.
D) mitigate the abuse committed by some men.
E) praise the success of female awareness campaigns.
